sn22.117:4.2: “Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī … pe …
sn22.117:4.3: sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.117:4.4: attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.117:4.5: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano rūpabandhanabaddho santarabāhirabandhanabaddho atīradassī apāradassī, baddho jīyati baddho mīyati baddho asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati.
sn22.117:4.8: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano vedanābandhanabaddho santarabāhirabandhanabaddho atīradassī apāradassī, baddho jīyati baddho mīyati baddho asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati.
sn22.117:4.12: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano viññāṇabandhanabaddho santarabāhirabandhanabaddho atīradassī apāradassī, baddho jīyati baddho mīyati baddho asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati.
sn22.117:5.1: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako ariyānaṃ dassāvī … pe …
sn22.117:5.2: sappurisadhamme suvinīto na rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.117:5.3: na attani vā rūpaṃ, na rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.117:5.4: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako na rūpabandhanabaddho, na santarabāhirabandhanabaddho, tīradassī, pāradassī;
sn22.117:5.10: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako na viññāṇabandhanabaddho, na santarabāhirabandhanabaddho, tīradassī, pāradassī, ‘parimutto so dukkhasmā’ti vadāmī”ti.
